717670f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 77th Street (West)
717670f-a.text:
Broadway, west side, north from and including West 77th (left), to and including 79th Streets, showing at the S.W. and N.W. corners respectively of these two extremes, the Hotel Belleclaire (No. 2171-77 BroadwaY), and the First Baptist Church. South of the latter is the hnewly constructed block square apartment house, the Apthorpe (No. 2201
-17 Broadway).
Note the summer type electric street car about to take on several passengers at West 77th Street; the photographer viewing same
from a point to the south (about 76th Street).
N.2. 27:3
October 1908. ' g7
George L. Balgue.

717669f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 77th Street
717669f-a.text:
Broadway at the N.W. corner of 77th Street. This site will later be occupied by a 14-story apartment house.
About 1920.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.
